name: part_007
file: tmp_【3D LIVE CONCERT】J-RAP in JIGOKU! + NEW 3D MODEL REVEAL! #JRAPinJIGOKU [dN7gTC10XLE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: MC section where Hakos Baelz and Mori Calliope talk about their performance and roots.
A lore-heavy animated sequence (Part 3) narrated by Mori Calliope about her journey and music.
Mori Calliope performs a cover of 'GILA GILA'.

subtitles.original: They shut it all down.

subtitles.english: They left the dream.

subtitles.original: “How am I supposed to go back?”
subtitles.english: “How am I supposed to go back?”

subtitles.original: “This music is the only reason I’m here.”
subtitles.english: “This music is the only reason I’m here.”

subtitles.original: “There’s nothing left back there for me.”
subtitles.english: “There’s nothing left back there for me.”

subtitles.original: “In a land where I lost my identity.”
subtitles.english: “In a land where I lost my identity.”

subtitles.original: “If there’s no more music here, then I have no choice but to go home.”
subtitles.english: “If there’s no more music here, then I have no choice but to go home.”

subtitles.original: It was music that kept me here.
subtitles.english: It was music that kept me here.

subtitles.english: But...

subtitles.english: It was a hand that reached out at that moment
